alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 1:03PM PST until January 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Primary travel impacts will be along higher elevation passes and summits.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
